comment: Smart data models - Parks and Gardens / Flower Bed adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.ParksAndGardens/master/FlowerBed/schema.json
description: A garden plot in which flowers (or other plants) are grown. Usually you will find flower beds in parks, gardens, pedestrian areas or at big highway interchanges.

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: color
contents.comment: The color of the product

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateLastWatering
contents.comment: Timestamp which corresponds to the last watering of the flower bed.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: depth
contents.comment: Depth of this flower bed.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: height
contents.comment: Heigth of this flower bed.

contents.name: image
contents.comment: An image of the item

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: nextWateringDeadline
contents.comment: Deadline for next watering operation.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: width
contents.comment: Width of this flower bed.

contents.name: annotations
contents.comment: Annotations about the item

contents.name: category
contents.comment: Category of this flower bed. Enum:'hedge, lawnArea, portable, urbanTreeSpot'. Or any extended value needed by the application.

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: shape
contents.comment: Shape of this flower bed. Enum:'rectangular, square, elliptic, polygonal, circular'. Or any other required by an application.

contents.name: taxon
contents.comment: Used to indicate the biological [taxon](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/en:taxon) to which the trees, or plants in the flower bed belong

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
